RobotWise.title: Robot Wise
RobotWise.description: Robot Wise is An immersive tablet application that enables children with Down syndrome to interact in real time with a physical robot, JetRacer.

features.title: Remote Robot Control
features.content: Children can control the JetRacer robot remotely through the application.

features.title: Live Drawing Activity
features.content: Freehand drawing activity that is validated in real-time by an AI agent using LiveKit, supporting the improvement of children's motor skills

features.title: AI-Generated Storytelling
features.content: Stories are generated using Gemini 2.0 Flash (text + adapted images), streamed using chunked API, and narrated with Speechify.

features.title: Explore Mode
features.content: Children can guide the robot to explore real-world objects, enhancing discovery and engagement.

features.title: Progress Synchronization
features.content: Child's progress and detected talents are synchronized with the global StepWise ecosystem.
